title: Manasellam Mazhaiye English Lyrics Saguni
stanzas:
Song: Manasellam Mazhaiye
Singers: Sonu Nigam, Saindhavi

Movie : Saguni
Music : G.V.Prakash


Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Manasellam mazhaiye,
ninaigiren uyire
en nenjil vandhu Thangi
saaral adidhaai
ennaagum uyire.. uyire

en kannil vandhu ninru
ennai parithaai
ennaagum uyire..uyire

Iravil vandhadhu chandirana
en azhage vandhadhu un mugamdhan
vennilavo valarndhadhum theindhidume
un azhago theindhidadha vennila

Pagalil eripadhu suriyana
en azhage un iru paarvaigal dhaan
un imaigal kooridum aayudham dhaan
en uyire ennai enna seigiraai

Mazhaiye
manam unnale poo pookudhe
Manasellam mazhaiye,
ninaigiren uyire

Vaanil pogum paravaigalaai
neeyum naanum pirandhidalaam
ulagaiye, marakkalaam

Veru veru vinveliyil
maari maari thirindhidalaam
Parakalaam,midhakalaam

Kaatrodu kai kordhu povomey
Mugilaagi angum ingum
unjal aaduvom..

Kanavil vaazhvadhu saathiyama!
en edhire nadapadhu mandhirama!
Kan paarkum kaatchigal thandhirama!
en dhegam yengu neendhi pogudho

kanavil vaazhvadhu saathiyamey
en kanavum palipadhu nichayamey
un viralai pidipen ikkanamey
un uruvam engum inrum vaazhumey

Mazhaiye
manam unnale poo pookudhe
Manasellam mazhaiye,
ninaigiren uyire

Kaadhalaagi karaindhuvitaal
kaalam neram marandhidumey
vaanilai, maarumey..

Ezhu vanna vaanivilil
nooru vannam thonridume
yaavumey..maayamey

Veyiloodu mazhai
vandhu thoorumey
mugilaagi angum
ingum unjal aaduvom

Tharaiyil vinmeen varuvadhillai
vandhaalum kannadhai paarpadhillai
paarthaalum kai adhai thoduvadhillai
thottalo enna aagum
en manam

Tharaiyil vinmeen varuvadhundu
vandhaalum kannadhai paarpadhundu
paarthaalum kai adhai thoduvadhundu
thottalo kaadhal
aagum un manam

Mazhaiye
manam unnale poo pookudhe

Manasellam mazhaiye..

English Translation
I tried my best :)

Mind is full of rain
I am drenching, my love.
If you stay in my
heart and drizzle
what will happen? My love

If you stand in my eyes
And pick me
what will happen? My love

Is that moon which comes at night?
but it’s your face, My beauty
white moon will fade away
but you beauty wont

Is that sun which burns in day?
But it’s your eyes, my beauty
Your eyes brow is sharp knife
My love what will you do me?

Rain …
Mind is blossoming coz of you
Mind is full of rain
I am drenching, my love.

Like birds in the sky
We will fly away
And forgot this world

In a different universe
We will roam here and there
We will fly, float…

We will join hands with air
And move to-and fro like
A feather

Is living in dream true?
Is this magic that happens to me?
What my eyes see is true?
Where my body swimming?

Living in dream in true
My dream will come  true
Will hold your hands right now
You will live forever

Rain …
Mind is blossoming coz of you
Mind is full of rain
I am drenching, my love.

If we fade with love
We will forgot time
Climate will change

In 7 color rainbow
100 color will show up
Everything is magic

Rain will come
along with sunlight
we will move around
like a feather

Star will never come earth
Can’t see even it comes
Can’t touch even you see it
If touched what will
happen to my mind

Star will come earth
If it comes, Eyes will see it
If we see, we can touch it
If its touches,
you mind will fall in love

Rain …
Mind is blossoming coz of you

Mind is full of rain….
